import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Fromcontainer from '../components/Fromcontainer' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartAction' const ShippingScreen = ({ history }) => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('submit') } return ( <>

Shipping Details

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} style={{ fontFamily: 'cursive', fontSize: '20px' }} > City setCity(e.target.value)} style={{ fontFamily: 'cursive', fontSize: '20px' }} > Postal Code setPostalCode(e.target.value)} style={{ fontFamily: 'cursive', fontSize: '20px' }} > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} style={{ fontFamily: 'cursive', fontSize: '20px' }} >
) } export default ShippingScreen
